name: Moonshot: Commando
description:
Instructions: Use WASD or arrow buttons to move around.

A quick note: certain enemies can only take damage from certain weapon types. 

Find the code for the game under MIT license here:

https://github.com/WolfgangSenff/GameOffJam2020

Note: none of the art/sound is under MIT license; see the readme for more.

This game was made in Godot!
